1.title: Las lecciones de Doña Enelia

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

1.plot: Even as a child, Pablo had a head for business. When he grows up, he begins working with El Alguacil and is introduced to the drug trade.

2.title: Jugando con Candela

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

2.plot: After his incarceration for theft, Pablo decides to enter the cocaine business by purchasing a farm to ensure drug production.

3.title: Escape de la Cárcel

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

3.plot: Pablo and Gonzalo are incarcerated for drug trafficking, while Fabio is forced to accept his sister Patricia's relationship with Pablo.

4.title: Pablo se entrega a las autoridades

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

4.plot: Using the planes he purchased, Pablo ships drugs to Miami, where Graciela handles distribution. Pablo gives his brother an unforgettable gift.

5.title: Pablo y Gonzalo inauguran la hacienda 'Napoles'

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

5.plot: Pablo builds Hacienda Nápoles. The news of an extradition treaty between Colombia and the United States puts him on high alert.

6.title: Una nueva fuerza armada nace

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

6.plot: The search for Irma proves fruitless, and the leaders of the organization meet to discuss the extradition treaty.

110.title: Entrega de Peluche y alias Marino

episode of.title: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal (TV Series 2012)

110.plot: The series begins and ends with his dramatic last moments before being shot to death by agents of the Colombian National Police, while escaping from a relative's home, and later flashing back to his childood in Valle de Aburra, Colombia, where Pablo is teased by his cousin, Gonzalo, and older brother, Peluche, on a footbridge crossing a creek, eventually rescued by his mother, who scolds Pablo for crying. His mother's influence on Escobar's life choices is portrayed in the first episode and throughout the series, starting with her admonishment that if he is going to ...
